articles.author: Elisabeth Buchwald
articles.title: Trump’s historic new tariffs are now in effect. Here’s what you need to know - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump just enacted a new wave of tariffs on dozens of America’s trading partners, marking a substantial escalation in ongoing trade tensions that could constitute the biggest change to the global economy in nearly a century.
